detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, a jersey-lined, wrapover hood with appliqués and embroidery, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties at the cuffs.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and small stand-up collar. Cut-out sections at the shoulders with elastication and a frill trim, and long sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs.
Fabric trainers with concealed elastication at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Metal hair clips in various designs, two of which are slides. Length from 6.5 cm to 7 cm.

One-shoulder satin top with a stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and concealed zip in the side. One long sleeve with a wide cuff with covered buttons and a sewn-on tie, and a gathered seam at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, low dropped shoulders, ribbed cuffs and a drawstring hem. Soft brushed inside.

Dress with a sewn-in cotton jersey bodysuit, an embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, short frilled sleeves and a plumeti weave skirt. Press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. The cotton content of the garment is organic.
Short dress in soft washed denim with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, lacing and metal eyelets at the back and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined, textured swimsuit with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Concealed elastication under the bust and a low-cut back.
Platform sandals in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Adjustable ankle strap with a round metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck and wrapover front. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side, and a skirt with pleats. Partly lined.

Imitation suede sandals with an ankle-high shaft, open sections at the sides, a zip at the back and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber soles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm, heel 12.5 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave with a high, elasticated waist. Lined.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Long kaftan in an airy jacquard weave made from recycled polyester with a V-neck front and back and two-part drawstring at the front. Unlined.
Ankle-length chinos in stretch cotton with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems with creases.

prod_name: HM+ Lulu Brazilian Sless HW MS
detail_desc: Shaping briefs in jersey with a high waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. Firm shaping effect on the waist.

Fleece-lined mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Reflective details and an elasticated strap with a press-stud at the wrists, and narrow elastication around the tops. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit jumper in soft merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Polo shirt in a textured premium cotton knit with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and a ribbed hem.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Vest top in soft slub jersey made from a linen blend with a deep neckline and frill-trimmed shoulder straps.
Low-necked vest top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey.

Parka in a nylon and cotton weave with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover fastening. Diagonal front pockets with a flap and press-stud and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a single back vent. Lined.

Wide V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with an embroidered pattern and decorated with embroidered ribbon. Double ties with tassels at the neck and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy cotton jersey with a deeper neckline, long sleeves and elasticated gathers front and back. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.
Short dress in a textured weave with a round neck, short sleeves, concealed zip at the back and a seam with pleats at the waist. Unlined.
Knitted, slub yarn jumper made from a cotton blend containing some mohair. Ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Short top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a lined hood in a contrasting colour. Buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leotard in fast-drying functional fabric with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.

Imitation leather ankle boots with pointed toes and open sections at the sides. Zip at the back and straps at the front, one with a metal buckle. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Tights in a fine knit with plastic sparkly stones and an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless, fitted top in a rib-knit viscose blend with ribbed trims around the neckline and armholes. Narrow cut at the top, both front and back.
Short, wide T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, printed sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Imitation leather clutch bag with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow imitation leather and metal chain shoulder strap and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 4x15x27 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Vest top in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.
Metal hair grips decorated with plastic beads. Length 8 cm.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey made from a soft cotton and modal blend with a square neckline and long puff sleeves. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Off-the shoulder top in a jacquard weave with a double flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps at the front and long sleeves. Visible zip at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey with a square neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a terry motif on the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas with a shirt and bottoms in patterned satin. Double-breasted shirt with a shawl collar. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Off-the-shoulder top in an airy weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps and a flounced trim at the top, a concealed zip at the back and an elasticated hem. Long sleeves with a button and frill trim at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable strap and metal fastener at the back.

Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a lyocell blend containing some linen with an opening and ties at the top and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim around the top, sleeves and hem.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Fully lined cotton corduroy trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and a back pocket. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Skinny-fit trousers in washed, patterned, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist. Zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Dress in fine-knit cotton with a rounded collar in a broderie anglaise weave, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and short sleeves.
Skirt in washed, stretch, patterned denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Pull-on trousers in a soft slub weave with an elasticated waist, decorative drawstring and patch front pockets.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Shorts in soft slub cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a foil print. Round neckline, an open section with wrapover sides at the back, and long sleeves. Unlined.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, and flap back and leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Hat in paper straw with a chambray band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.

Long-sleeved romper suits in soft jersey with press-studs down the front and at the crotch, and feet with elastication at the heels. Size 0-2M have cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. The romper suits are made partly from organic cotton.
Cotton jersey dress with a patterned tulle skirt. Glittery print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Satin-lined skirt.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
